mapper.select: SELECT u.*, r.role_desc as role FROM user u INNER JOIN user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.user_name = #{email};
mapper.insert: insert into user ( user_name, password, email, age, role ) value ( #{user_name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{age}, #{role} )
